member.name: M:congestion_tax_calculator.Web.Controllers.TaxFeeController.CalculateTax(Congestion_tax_calculator.AppDomain.VehiclePassInfo)
member.summary: Calulate total tax for vehicles according to the pass dates and the vehicle type
member.param: liste of dates in yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss 2013-02-08 06:01:00 , vtype:exempted(motorcycle,tractor,emergency,diplomat,foreign,military) other types are taxable (car,other)
member.returns: total tax fees for all dates of the taxable vehicles rather than return 0

member.name: M:congestion_tax_calculator.Web.Controllers.TaxFeeController.CalculateTaxWithDataStore(Congestion_tax_calculator.AppDomain.VehiclePassInfo)
member.summary: Calulate total tax for vehicles Reading City toll Rules from DB after Migration to Local SQL DB
member.param: liste of dates in yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss 2013-02-08 06:01:00 , vtype:exempted(motorcycle,tractor,emergency,diplomat,foreign,military) other types are taxable (car,other)
member.returns: total tax fees for all dates of the taxable vehicles rather than return 0
